articles.title: REGEN: Empowering personalized recommendations with natural language
articles.summary: A research project exploring how natural language can enhance personalized recommendation systems using advanced machine intelligence techniques.

articles.title: Introducing the Anthropic Economic Futures Program
articles.summary: Anthropic launches a new economic futures program to explore potential economic impacts of AI technology.

articles.title: How People Use Claude for Support, Advice, and Companionship
articles.summary: An exploration of how individuals are utilizing Claude for personal support and interaction.

articles.title: Modeling natural conversational dynamics with Seamless Interaction
articles.summary: Explores dyadic motion modeling to transform AI interactions, enabling more nuanced and human-like communication.
